summary: "Saw" is a 2004 horror movie directed by James Wan. It's about a killer named Jigsaw who forces his victims to play deadly games to survive. Two men wake up in a bathroom, one ordered to kill the other to save his family. Written by Leigh Whannell, the story was developed with Wan. They struggled to produce it in Australia, so they made a short film to attract producers in Los Angeles. The film became a surprise hit, making over $100 million worldwide and leading to many sequels, games, and other merchandise.
title: Saw (film)
